website_summaries.verdict: A solid and durable double guitar stand. Features an automatic grip that will lock your guitar in place, and release when you lift it from the stand. Lightweight and portable.
pros: This guitar stand can hold two guitars, electric or acoustic
The automatic grip holder will close when a guitar is placed in it, and open back up when lifted out
High density foam covered back rest offers support and protection from scratches
Easily folds down into a carry bag
cons: Some users find this stand larger than other models

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand...  Always a Hercules.
customer_reviews.text: I aleady have 2 single guitar stands from Hercules. They both work great, so when I decided on a portable 2 guitar stand, it was a no brainer. Though foldable, it's not very compact, but its design keeps two guitars very secure. No worry about removing just one, the other stays put. When I think about how much I've invested in my instruments, this stand is an incredible value. A small sacrifice in portability pays big dividends in securing your prized posessions.
customer_reviews.author: M G M Jr

customer_reviews.title: It was sturdy. I liked the adjustments and the holding methodology
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy. Seems very stable on the floor and unlikely to tip. However, no kind of manual or guide or set up advice came with it and I didn't seem able to learn anything from the website about recommended positioning of components. The central collar that supports the upper yokes and attaches to the vertical support shaft seems a bit loose and no way to tighten it. I contacted the company and they had very little, if any advice or help.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Holds Two Electric Guitars With Ease
customer_reviews.text: I love this guitar stand! I keep this stand in my practice space, and hang my electric guitars on it. I keep one guitar tuned to DADGAD and one guitar with standard tuning, and I can switch back and forth with ease. The stand is heavyweight, and I have no concerns about it falling over holding my Les Paul. I especially like the locking mechanism that works based on the weight of the guitar headstock hitting it. That was a nice engineering twist to the stand design.
customer_reviews.author: C. BennettTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Improved Design from Hercules for their famous DUAL guitar stand
customer_reviews.text: I had one of Herucles previous dual guitar stands - there is nothing to compare with them. Unfotunately the height adjustment broke, so I just jammed it to an approximate height for acoustic guitars, this stand does not travel so I don't need it to collapse. The rubber lever fittings became very sticky so it was time to update. This new one seems improved in design - it should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Williams

customer_reviews.title: Balanced
customer_reviews.text: My worst fear is having a light box guitar on one side and a heavy jazz bass on the other creating a balance problem: Not! The wide 3 legged base is good for this. The wonderful grips (they grab your guitar neck when you put the guitar on it and lock it in place until you grab the guitar again) is ingenious and works every time. Good design, tough, sturdy and looks good on stage.
customer_reviews.author: John Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on cheaper guitar stands -- they're flimsy and tippy. I'll happily spend a few bucks more to buy Hercules products, because I know I'm getting a thoughtfully designed, solid, and balanced product. I take mine onstage whenever I gig.
customer_reviews.author: My Dog Wally

customer_reviews.title: very nice guitar stands
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with the construction, and performance of this guitar stand, should have bought the one for three guitars instead of two. but very happy with what I got. would highly recommend this guitar stand.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Got an odd shaped guitar? This stands for you!!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is a must have. The most secure stand for all your guitars. I bought a Gibson Thunderbird and using a conventional guitar stand just didn't hold the guitar well. I got this stand and no more worry about my $1500 guitar falling on stage as I used a different guitar. I highly highly highly recommend this to anyone who uses a guitar whose bottom is anything but round.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jordan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not good for any ban
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it would be fine for pretty much all guitars, but for you banjo players out there looking for a double stand I wouldn't recommend this. It's certainly sturdy and well-made, but the "locking" mechanism at the top was far too wide for my banjo pegheads, so it put all of the weight of the banjo on the tuning machines. Not good. Perhaps if your banjo has a guitar-style paddle peghead you would have a better experience, but my Ramsey Standard & Reiter Whyte Laydie banjos didn't work at all so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Eggers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, space-saving guitar stand
customer_reviews.text: This guitar stand is well built and stable. It saves space by holding 2 guitars on opposite sides of the stand. I use the stand in my home, so cannot say how convenient it is to fold up and transport it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Steveearlefan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but works great! My son and husband both have one and really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hercules guitar stand. Bought this one so I could have my acoustic as well as electric guitars close for my practicing. Really like the easy height adjustment. Would definitely recommend this product. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very well designed and well made. It's very sturdy; I put my "heavy" electric on it and played around; you'd really have to smack it hard at the top of the stand to topple the thing, even unbalanced with only one guitar on it. The stand's feet take up about a 2x2 foot square, you might need a bit more room if your guitars are very large. Sets up and folds down very quickly and easily. Putting your guitar in the stand is just like handing it to someone -- it's that quick and easy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bringonthebooks

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Hercules
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my 1st Hercules stand. I had such a positive experience with the single guitar stand, it had to be a Hercules when I needed a stand for my 2 bass guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Keeps the guitars safe and secure and won’t tip over
customer_reviews.author: brenda Storseth

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reliable and sturdy stand for the stage to quickly switch between acoustic and electric guitars. This stand was the ticket. Ready to go right out of the box. Easy to setup and collapse. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Hill

customer_reviews.title: functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the receiver is pleased with it. It is sturdy to hold both acoustic and electric guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand
customer_reviews.text: After years of cheap guitar stands--and several broken guitars--I'm kicking myself for not buying one of these a long time ago. Awesome product. Super durable and stable. Automatic grip locks for the head stock. They're a little pricey, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphinian

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate guitar stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand! Very sturdy, and it grips the bass (or guitar) at the head stock so it wont slip out. Very portable, and very sturdy. I'm looking forward to taking this to a gig.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Novitch

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Unmatched quality but I miss only needing a cheap $10 stand. Cheap, they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Jhug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product to hold 2 guitars at same time. It is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Well designed guitar stand
customer_reviews.text: Best guitar stand on the market for two guitars. Sad they discontinued the wood finish. Not everyone uses these backstage - mine is in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Graet quality easy to assembly, break down and to use. Very secure for holding guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Simonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for holding 2 guitars at gigs
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar holder. I use it at every gig with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: S. Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, securely holds my guitars in place. They look great in the stand.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAmazonian

customer_reviews.title: Hercules Dual stand is a total fail but.....
customer_reviews.text: The height adjustment became very tacky over time and plastic disintegrated and broke with the spring popping off. Both acoustic guitars came crashing down, one was a 1967 B-25 Gibson. Fortunately, the guitars did not suffer damage. The stand is toast. I hear there is a lifetime guarantee. I contacted customer service and received an email that I will be contacted soon. Four days and still waiting. I wouldn’t buy another Hercules. Update: Customer service contacted me and they are replacing the broken stand. We’ll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Tonai

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best stand on the market. Well built, solid, easy set up/ tear down, stable (I hang an acoustic on one side & electric on the other). Definitely worth the peace of mind swapping from the cradling stands. I'd buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: NETX Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Quality Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is my second stand and right out of the box I was impressed with the quality construction. This stand securely holds your guitars by their headstocks, and uses the weight of the guitars to secure them. This unit is very solid, constructed similar to something you would utilize for industrial use or with power tools. I'm very pleased. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My second one of these and I love them. Built well and holds my guitars tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy two guitar stand
customer_reviews.text: What a sturdy stand. Well built and safe for your high end guitars
customer_reviews.author: VernJK

customer_reviews.title: Good stand, don't skimp... spend the money on this one and protect your guitars
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this a long time ago. It's sturdy, adjustable and perfect on stage, doesn't take up oodles of room
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Steady
customer_reviews.text: Using it for 2 electric guitars and I don't have to worry about one getting bumped off.
customer_reviews.author: David Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand for switching instruments safely.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Stable. Much better than the travelite version I have been using. Neck yoke works well for mandolin family instruments.
customer_reviews.author: vincent capostagno

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME STAND!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great! I love the Hercules clamp that locks your guitar from falling off... and the adjustable back rest is very flexible and can be used with just about any guitar. The stand is extremely sturdy as well! The price is a bit high, but it is definately worth it in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: STURDY STAND!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand, a very sturdy workhorse. I've had a single stand for years without any issues, and though I haven't had the Duo for long, I do expect it to last as just as long.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Hercules GS422B A/G DUO Guitar Stand
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I picked up a Hercules single guitar stand and liked it so much that bought another two of them. I own a few guitars (both Bass and Electric 6 String) and the double stand works perfect for everything I have. The adjustable height will easily accomodate anything from a Strat to a Rickenbacker Bass, and it takes up less space than two stands.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Q.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce...just don't pinch your fingers in the locky thingy like I did
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the hype for sure. Much better than other stands I've used and breaks down nicely to fit into my gig bag (by gig bag I mean a drum hardware bag that I've re-purposed to carry all of my pedals, DI, microphones, etc.). The only downside I've found is what I mentioned in the review title...ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Hercules Stands Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I always knew that Hercules stands were a high quality stand and I was lucky to find the duo guitar stand for about the same price I would pay for a Herc single stand. This stand helps a lot when it comes to saving some room on a stage. I bring two bass guitars to my gigs, because as a cover band we have songs with different tunings. The Hercules duo stand has no trouble handling both basses and it is just as stable when only one guitar is in the stand. Bottom line is stop wasting money on cheap guitar stands and protect your instrument/investment in a Hercules Stand.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I like the way the prongs grip the neck and I love that it folds up with a slim profile to fit in a gear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Craig

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Got it for my son. Better than others he saw
customer_reviews.author: Catlady

customer_reviews.title: I ran over it with a car
customer_reviews.text: Hercules makes great stuff. After accidentally running over this with my car (oops), I was able to bend it back into shape and continue to use it today. That sells me on it.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Great stand....
customer_reviews.text: After I bought and returned several stands this one I really like...Very sturdy and stable...
customer_reviews.author: Deryl Houser

customer_reviews.title: Best Guitar Stand Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few guitar stands in my time. Sadly, over the years, they've never held up. I decided to go big and purchase something a little more expensive than what I normally spend. The money was definitely worth it! The stand is easily ready to use out of the box. Everything that needs to be padded is. In fact, after I purchased this one I purchased another one to keep at Church! Great investment! Great stand! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dagenhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for 2 guitars - Very durable / Well built.
customer_reviews.author: SwedeNC

customer_reviews.title: I love this duo guitar stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this duo guitar stand....Made very well...holds my Gibson SG and my Epiphone dot with no trouble at all...
customer_reviews.author: Lorre Kitahata

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product came in one side would not latch and hold guitar. Therefor I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-designed for any guitar type
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this stand.. it holds my wide-bodied acoustic and heavy Les Paul just fine, and doesn't wobble or tip over when one is removed. Automatic locking pins hold the next in place which is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: salamander

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Hercules single stands, I have several. this, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: TAMPABLUES

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. The engineering is solid as well as the construction. Would buy more of their products (Hercules)
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the construction of these stands. Very solid.
customer_reviews.author: fishmusic

customer_reviews.title: Hercules GS422B A/G DUO Guitar Stand
customer_reviews.text: I love these duo stands....!!! This is my second one. The locking feature is really nice! No accidental drops by young kids...
customer_reviews.author: RayMan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.. kinda bulky
customer_reviews.text: Very nice .. kinda bulky. . But no worries .. it won't fall over..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hercules GS422B A/G DUO Guitar Stand
customer_reviews.text: Best stand I've ever owned bar none. Very sturdy,probably last a lifetime. Would highly recommend this product Bobby M. Sacramento Ca.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest stand I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, and good looks make this an exceptional value for protecting and showcasing even your most valuable instruments. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I own 3 of these
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best guitar stand I've ever used. They fold up great for travel and do a wonderful job. You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: cvmaparadog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these guys make the best, highest quality stands in the biz!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to some roadie abuse!!
customer_reviews.text: This was JUST what the ex boyfriend needed at the time and he's still using it today.
customer_reviews.author: R. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great for space management. I hang two basses with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: T. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I highly recommend this product. Just what I needed. Hercules is a reputable brand and always delivers. Also was on time!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand but rubber handle might be fragile
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It's stable and stylish. But the first shipment I got had small rubber fragments fallen off the handle. If I receive a good one the first time then it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Guitar stand, love it so far. Easy to use !
customer_reviews.author: Randy Prewett

customer_reviews.title: excellen stand
customer_reviews.text: this is very sturdy stand, the name says it a'''' Hercules. The only thing I would like is the ability to change the holder from double to a triple head
customer_reviews.author: G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery, Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic guitar stand and one of the sturdiest, most professional looking stands you'll find. Collapses (not super small when collapsed) which is nice. Really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D Goerzen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! everything as described, shipped so fast as if it was from my next door neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundas Geguzis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish all products were engneered as well as this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Strong, secure stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand. It is a bit bulky,however I feel that my guitars are secure. I love how it grips the neck of the guitar when placed in the stand!
customer_reviews.author: D. Jiosa

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Efficient Guitar  Stand
customer_reviews.text: Best guitar stand for multiple instruments safe and quick access. I have used a variety of stands over the years and this is the best product, without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Louis W. Rosgen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is awesome and bought this for me! Holds 2 guitars perfectly and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Holds both my guitars very sturdy and looks professional when gigging. A must have for a multiguitar pro! JAM ON!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Jeffes

customer_reviews.title: Hercules GS422B A/G DUO
customer_reviews.text: As with all Hercules products it is solid. I feel secure when I have expensive instruments resting on Hercules stands.
customer_reviews.author: bnog316

customer_reviews.title: Stand
customer_reviews.text: Awesome just.like any other hercules stand. Works great for Ibanez basses breaks down easily and is sturdy. I buy another if i had more guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Biracial jesus

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar Stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand folds up well and takes very little space. It is made very solid and holds both guitars very well. I was very impressed and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Fuller

product_meta.title: Hercules GS422B A/G DUO Guitar Stand
product_meta.description: Features: 2 folding Auto Grip System yokes Comfort Grip Folding Backrests Specially Formulated Foam Height: 905-1130mm (35.6-44.5") Weight: 2.6kg (5.7 lbs.) Base radius: 430mm (16.9") Load capacity: 20kg (44lbs) Folded size: 760x115mm (29.9x4.5")
